CLUE: Japanese dish, often cooked at table
FOUND IN: Sukiyaki: A slow-simmered mixture of beef, vegetables, and tofu cooked in soy sauce and sugar served at room temperature or warm, usually shared from communal pots on the dining table.

CLUE: Kind of small trout - burn it black
FOUND IN: Charred troutlet, a playful and hypothetical diminutive term for an exceptionally tiny trout which can't practically exist ("troutlet").
